name: Get Lost (Some Code Guy)
description:
-The goal of the game is to get lost! You do this by getting as far from the start as possible, discovering more and more areas as you figure out how to unlock their pathways.  

-But watch out! If you go too long without unlocking a new area, you will die!  

-As areas get larger it becomes increasingly difficult to manage one's time.  -How many new areas will you discover?
